texts.name: La Vie d'Edouard le Confesseur (c. 1163-70)
texts.shelfmark: London, British Library, MS Additional 70513, ff. 55v-85v
texts.adaptation: A verse Life largely based on Aelred of Rievaulx’s Vita S. Edwardi - fragmentary, ends at line 4240.

texts.name: La Vie d'Edouard le Confesseur (c. 1163-70)
texts.shelfmark: Rome, Biblioteca Apostolica Vaticana, MS Reginensis Latinus 489, ff. 1-35
texts.adaptation: A verse Life largely based on Aelred of Rievaulx’s Vita S. Edwardi - fragmentary, comprising only lines 1463-6885 of the Vie

texts.name: La Vie d'Edouard le Confesseur (c. 1163-70)
texts.shelfmark: Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France, MS français 1416, ff. 157-181
texts.adaptation: A verse Life largely based on Aelred of Rievaulx’s Vita S. Edwardi - fragmentary, comprising only lines c. 69-4482 of the Vie

texts.name: De saint Edouart (c. 1300-25)
texts.shelfmark: London, British Library, MS Egerton 745, ff. 91-129v
texts.adaptation: A prose reworking of La Vie d'Edouard le Confesseur

texts.name: La Estoire de Seint Aedward le Rei (c. 1236-45)
texts.shelfmark: Cambridge, Cambridge University Library, MS Ee.3.59
texts.adaptation: A verse Life largely based on Aelred of Rievaulx’s Vita S. Edwardi

texts.name: Life of Edward the Confessor (c. 1300)
texts.shelfmark: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS Ashmole 43 (SC 6924), ff. 260-269v
texts.adaptation: A Middle English verse adapation of Aelred of Rievaulx’s Vita S. Edwardi (perhaps via a French translation)
texts.integrated: An addition to the South English Legendary

texts.name: Life of Edward the Confessor (c. 1300)
texts.shelfmark: London, British Library, MS Cotton Julius D. IX, ff. 281-297v
texts.adaptation: A Middle English verse adapation of Aelred of Rievaulx’s Vita S. Edwardi (perhaps via a French translation)
texts.integrated: An addition to the South English Legendary

texts.name: Life of Edward the Confessor (c. 1300)
texts.shelfmark: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS Bodley 779 (SC 2567), ff. 273-279v
texts.adaptation: A condensed Middle English verse adapation of Aelred of Rievaulx’s Vita S. Edwardi (perhaps via a French translation)
texts.integrated: An addition to the South English Legendary

texts.name: Life of Edward the Confessor (s. XV)
texts.shelfmark: London, British Library, MS Additional 35298, ff. 48-53
texts.adaptation: A prose Life in English, ultimately based on Aelred of Rievaulx’s Vita S. Edwardi (possibly via an intermediate source)
texts.integrated: Added to manuscript of the Gilte Legende collection of saints' lives, the English version of the Golden Legend

texts.name: Life of Edward the Confessor (s. XV)
texts.adaptation: A prose Life of St Edward (probably a reworking of an earlier English Life), with parallels to the SEL version in Cotton Julius D. IX

texts.name: Játvarðar saga (s. XIV)
texts.shelfmark: Reykjavík, Arnamagnæan Institute, GkS 1005 fol., ff. 212-213 (Flateyjarbók)
texts.adaptation: A prose Life of Edward the Confessor adapted and translated from various sources, including Latin lives by Osbert of Clare and Aelred of Rievaulx

texts.name: Játvarðar saga (s. XIV)
texts.shelfmark: Stockholm, National Library of Sweden, Perg. fol. no. 5, ff. 68v-71
texts.adaptation: A prose Life of Edward the Confessor adapted and translated from various sources, including Latin lives by Osbert of Clare and Aelred of Rievaulx

texts.name: Játvarðar saga (s. XIV)
texts.shelfmark: Copenhagen, Arnamagnæan Institute, AM 238 fol. XVI
texts.adaptation: A prose Life of Edward the Confessor adapted and translated from various sources, including Latin lives by Osbert of Clare and Aelred of Rievaulx
